name: Combat Multiplayer (PC)
description:
Português (BR):

Jogador 1: WASD (para mover) e SPACE (para atirar).

Jogador 2: < ^ > v (para mover) e Enter (para atirar).

Primeiro jogo feito na faculdade FIAP.

English:

Player 1: WASD (to move) and SPACE (to shoot).

Player 2: <^> v (to move) and Enter (to shoot).

First game made in FIAP college.
